ol.title: To create a new directory:

li.p: In the File Management menu group, click File List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Click Add Directory. The Add Directory window appears.
Type the name you want in the New Directory Name field.
Click OK. The home page appears with a message informing you that the directory was successfully created.
